description: Watch your mark with FOUR BOMBS! Carefully scan the mine field for bombs by learning a common pattern among surrounding spaces. Find all 4 bombs and win - levels randomly generated for endless fun!
name: FOUR BOMBS
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
